Description: Oracle Apps Technical ConsultantSolution Design: Collaborate with functional consultants and business stakeholders to understand business requirements and design technical solutions using Oracle Applications.Customization and Development: Customize Oracle E-Business Suite applications through extensions, modifications, and interfaces using Oracle development tools like Oracle Forms, Reports, PL/SQL, and Workflow.Data Migration: Perform data migration and integration tasks to ensure seamless data flow between various Oracle modules and third-party systems.Technical Documentation: Create detailed technical documentation, including design specifications, data models, and test plans.System Testing: Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and performance testing to validate the functionality and performance of developed solutions.Troubleshooting and Support: Investigate and resolve technical issues and provide post-implementation support to end-users.Performance Tuning: Identify and optimize performance bottlenecks in Oracle Applications to enhance system performance.
